Package fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.jrava.storage

Class FileSystemStorage

java.lang.Object
fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.jrava.storage.FileSystemStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storage
public class FileSystemStorage extends Object implements Storage
File system implementation of storage service. All activities are supposed to be stored as separate files (named with activity id, with .jrv extension), in a same directory.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sebastien Jean
